00001 %> @file Sensor_element_circular.m
00002 %> @brief Circular element of sensor.
00003 % ======================================================================
00004 %> @brief Circular element of sensor.
00005 %>
00006 %> Circular element have permittivty and voltage grid, point vector,
00007 %> and circular geometry.
00008 % ectsim - Electrical Capacitance Tomography - Image Reconstruction Toolbox
00009 % ======================================================================
00010 classdef Sensor_element_circular  < Sensor_element
00011 
00012    properties (GetAccess = public)  
00013    %> radius-inner part of Sensor_element_circular in grid elements
00014    rmin;
00015    %> radius-outer part of Sensor_element_circular in grid elements
00016    rmax;                 
00017    %> radius-inner part of Sensor_element_circular in milimeters
00018    rmin_mm;
00019    %> radius-outer part of Sensor_element_circular in milimeters
00020    rmax_mm;
00021    %> permittivity value
00022    permittivity = 1; 
00023    %> vector of indicies (only for this element) linear index to value_list (discretization grid)
00024    point_list;           
00025    %> element name
00026    element_name='Sensor_element_circular';
00027    %> start angle [degree]
00028    start_angle;
00029    %> stop angle [degree]
00030    stop_angle;
00031    %> voltage value [volts], 'none' means potential is unknown
00032    voltage='none';       
00033    %> grid with permittivity distribution (discretization grid object)
00034    discretization_grid_of_element; 
00035    %> grid with boundary conditions (discretization grid object)
00036    discretization_grid_of_voltage;   
00037    end
00038    
00039    properties (SetAccess=private)
00040    %> temporary grid (not to use)
00041    discretization_grid_point_list_tmp; 
00042    end
00043 
00044    methods (Access=public)
00045        % ==================================================================
00046        %> @brief Constructor.
00047        %>
00048        %> @param varargin{1} start_angle [degree] where object begins
00049        %> @param varargin{2} stop_angle [degree] where object ends
00050        %> @param varargin{3} rmin_mm [milimeters] radius-inner part of element
00051        %> @param varargin{4} rmax_mm [milimeters] radius-outer part of element
00052        %> @param varargin{5} discretization grid object (main model grid)
00053        %> @param varargin{6} voltage [volts], 'none' means potential is unknown            
00054        %> @param varargin{7} permittivity value                                                                      
00055        %> @param varargin{8} element name (it is important to name field of view 'fov' and electrode 'electrode')                             
00056        %> @return instance of the Sensor_element_circular class.
00057        % ==================================================================
00058        function Sensor_element_circular_obj = Sensor_element_circular(varargin)           
00059           if nargin == 0 ; % no input arguments
00060           elseif isa(varargin{1},'Sensor_element_circular')
00061             Sensor_element_circular_obj = varargin{1}; % copy constructor
00062             display 'copy constructor Sensor_element_circular'
00063             return;          
00064           else
00065              switch(nargin)
00066                 case 8,
00067 
00068                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.start_angle=varargin{1};
00069                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.stop_angle=varargin{2};
00070                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmin_mm=varargin{3}; % [mm]
00071                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmax_mm=varargin{4}; % [mm]
00072                     
00073                     
00074                     discretization_grid_tmp=varargin{5};
00075                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.voltage=varargin{6};                                                           
00076                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.permittivity=varargin{7};                   
00077                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.element_name=varargin{8};
00078                     
00079                     if (Sensor_element_circular_obj.permittivity<1)                    
00080                         error('Permittivity is less than one');   
00081                     end
00082                     
00083                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmin=Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmin_mm/discretization_grid_tmp.grid_size_mm; % pixels
00084                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmax=Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmax_mm/discretization_grid_tmp.grid_size_mm; % pixels
00085                     
00086                     str=Sensor_element_circular_obj.element_name;
00087                   
00088                     fprintf('%s creating \n',str);
00089 
00090                     K=discretization_grid_tmp.number_of_x_axis_pixel;
00091                     
00092                     % Each element has own discretization grid. Not
00093                     % reference to one discretizationgrid
00094                     ms=discretization_grid_tmp.matrix_size_mm;
00095                     gs=discretization_grid_tmp.grid_size_mm;
00096                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_element=Discretization_grid_2D_square(ms,gs);
00097                     
00098                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_point_list_tmp=Discretization_grid_2D_square(ms,gs);
00099                     
00100                     Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_point_list_tmp.value_list=...
00101                         ones(1, length(Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_point_list_tmp.value_list))*(-1);                    
00102                     
00103                     
00104                     % create dg_voltage only for this elements where voltage!='none'
00105                     if(~strcmp(Sensor_element_circular_obj.voltage,'none'))
00106                         Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_voltage=Discretization_grid_2D_square(ms,gs);
00107                     end
00108                     
00109                     %minimal step angle to draw object
00110                     %TODO checking round and abs of rmin i rmax
00111                     radius_length=abs(abs(Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmax)-abs(Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmin));
00112                     
00113                     radius_step=abs(discretization_grid_tmp.grid_size_mm/2);
00114                     
00115                     for l=1:radius_step:radius_length                       
00116                         
00117                     radius=Sensor_element_circular_obj.rmin+l;
00118 
00119                     step_angle=atan(double((pi/180)*(1/radius)));                
00120                     
00121                     radian_stop  =( (pi * Sensor_element_circular_obj.stop_angle) / 180 );
00122                     radian_start =( (pi*Sensor_element_circular_obj.start_angle) / 180 ); 
00123                    
00124                     NOP=round((2*(abs(radian_start-radian_stop)))/step_angle);
00125 
00126                    % calculate Sensor_element_circular points                     
00127                     THETA=linspace(radian_start,radian_stop,NOP);
00128                     RHO=ones(1,NOP)*radius;
00129                     [X,Y] = pol2cart(THETA,RHO);
00130                     
00131                     max_val=discretization_grid_tmp.number_of_x_axis_pixel;
00132                     
00133            
00134                     R=abs(round(X(:)+(K/2)+0.5));
00135                     C=abs(round(-Y(:)+(K/2)+0.5));                                        
00136                   
00137                     fr1=find(R>max_val,1);                       
00138                     fr2=find(R<0,1);
00139                         
00140                     fc1=find(C>max_val,1);
00141                     fc2=find(C<0,1);
00142                         
00143                     if(isempty(fr1)&&isempty(fr2)&&isempty(fc1)&&isempty(fc2))
00144                         
00145                         val_vector_tmp=(ones(1, numel(C))*Sensor_element_circular_obj.permittivity)';
00146 
00147 
00148                         Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_element.insert_value_in_point(C,R,val_vector_tmp);                         
00149 
00150                         Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_point_list_tmp.insert_value_in_point(C,R,val_vector_tmp); 
00151 
00152 
00153                         % voltage boundary map
00154                         if(~strcmp(Sensor_element_circular_obj.voltage,'none'))                        
00155 
00156                             voltage_val_vector_tmp=ones(1, numel(C))*Sensor_element_circular_obj.voltage;
00157 
00158                             %lnv=length(Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list);
00159                             % insert zeros ewerywhere in voltage map
00160                             Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list(:)=0;
00161 
00162                             Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_voltage.insert_value_in_point(C,R,voltage_val_vector_tmp);
00163 
00164                             %b_map=Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list;
00165     %                         ind=find(b_map==1);
00166     %                         ind
00167     %                         b_map(ind)=zeros(1,1:numel(ind));
00168                             %Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list=b_map;
00169 
00170                         end
00171 
00172 
00173 
00174 
00175                          tmp_value_list=Sensor_element_circular_obj.discretization_grid_point_list_tmp.value_list;
00176 
00177                          Sensor_element_circular_obj.point_list=find(tmp_value_list==Sensor_element_circular_obj.permittivity);           
00178                          else
00179                                  error('Current element is bigger than using discretization grid. Change grid or parameters of element.');                 
00180                     end % isempty
00181                     
00182                     end % 'main' for
00183                 otherwise  
00184                   error('To less or to much input elements');                    
00185              end
00186           end
00187        %end constructor
00188        
00189        end     
00190        
00191        % ==================================================================
00192        %> @brief Geometric sketch of element
00193        % ==================================================================
00194        function drawing(s_obj)
00195            x_cntr=s_obj.discretization_grid_of_element.discret_matrix_size;
00196            y_cntr=s_obj.discretization_grid_of_element.discret_matrix_size;
00197            % check is number is odd or even
00198            if(mod(x_cntr,2)==0) 
00199                x_center=x_cntr+0.5;
00200            else
00201                x_center=x_cntr;
00202            end
00203            
00204            if(mod(y_cntr,2)==0) 
00205                y_center=y_cntr+0.5;
00206            else
00207                y_center=y_cntr;
00208            end
00209            s_obj.pie(x_center,y_center,s_obj.rmin*2,s_obj.rmax*2,s_obj.start_angle,s_obj.stop_angle);
00210        end
00211        
00212        % ==================================================================
00213        %> @brief Draw discrete permittivity representation of element. Two modes are 
00214        %> available: auto or thresholds.
00215        %>
00216        %> @param varargin{1} mode - auto or threshold
00217        %> @param varargin{2} value of lower threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)
00218        %> @param varargin{3} value of upper threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)       
00219        % ==================================================================
00220        function draw_permittivity(varargin)                      
00221            
00222            % default - auto
00223            if nargin==1
00224                se_obj=varargin{1};               
00225                se_obj.discretization_grid_of_element.set_display_thresholds('auto');
00226                se_obj.discretization_grid_of_element                           
00227                 
00228            % thresholds
00229            elseif nargin==4
00230                 se_obj=varargin{1};
00231                 mode=varargin{2};
00232                 lt_tmp=varargin{3};
00233                 ut_tmp=varargin{4};
00234                 
00235                 if (strcmp(mode,'thresholds'))
00236                     
00237                     se_obj.discretization_grid_of_element.set_display_thresholds('thresholds',lt_tmp,ut_tmp);
00238                     se_obj.discretization_grid_of_element
00239                 else
00240                     error 'Incorrect threshold mode'
00241                 end                                
00242                 
00243            else
00244                error 'Incorrect number of input elements'
00245            end                      
00246            
00247        end % draw_permittivity
00248               
00249    end %end methods
00250

00259     %> @param line,points use to display (optional)

00262     pie(s_obj,xc,yc,d1,d2,a1,a2,line,points)
00263
